name: DeepKeys
description:
An Arcade game made in just one hour as a simple challenge to test my abilities and also have some fun in this pandemic situation.

The goal in DeepKeys is to kill destroy as many enemies as possible in a limited amount of time by typing the right character showed on the screen. Typing fast is now a requirement to not lose.

Kill an enemy and you'll be rewarded with extra time, but as always there is also a dark side of the situation! Hit the wrong key and you'll lose an important amount of time! Be quick and Be careful!
